page.title: 13The Majorettes
page.content: I am in the Darfield Royals Majorettes. When I first joined I was on a baton, but in about two months I was on a side drum. I have gradually worked through the drum section because last summer I was the smallest and newest drummer. This year I was moved onto the reserve lead drum so that if ever the lead was absent I could take her place. Recently I took her place in a competetion and I won a bronze medal. Last year we had uniforms, blue dresses trimmed with red and white.We have now got new pleated skirts, jackets and hats. We also have red sashes to put our medals on. We pratice marching two nights a week at our school,and the band practices once a week.
